code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./CustomeLib.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{FaPlus,FaList,FaRocket}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomeLib=()=>{const[signs,setSigns]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/signs').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setSigns(data)).catch(err=>console.error('Error:',err));},[]);const handleTrainModel=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/train_model');alert(res.data.message);}catch(err){console.error('Training error:',err);alert('Training failed.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lib-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"lib-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83E\uDDE0 Sign Language Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lib-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"lib-btn",onClick:()=>navigate('custom-library/AddSign'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaPlus,{})," Capture Sign"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"lib-btn",onClick:()=>navigate('custom-library/SignList'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaList,{})," View All Signs"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"overview-title",children:"\uD83D\uDCE6 Sign Classes Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cardd-grid",children:signs.map((sign,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:5000/".concat(sign.image_url),alt:sign.class_name,className:"cardd-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cardd-title",children:sign.class_name})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"train-btn-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"train-button",onClick:handleTrainModel,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaRocket,{className:"rocket-icon"})," Train CNN Model"]})})]});};export default CustomeLib;
